topic.title: Glossary
topic.shortdesc: This section comprises Finshape's internal terms and definitions.

dlentry.dd: Action is a one simple physical act, that user performs within the software product.

body.example:
Example: open; click; select; enter; close
Add-on Add-ons are not standalone products that are capable to provide services independently from other components, so they may be offered to a client in combination with Core Digital Banking solution only.
Authentication and Authorization solution
The authentication and authorization is a product (solution) that provides a comprehensive, secure, and scalable service: identity, access, and operational governance across the entire digital banking system. This service is delivered through the DBOS components Digital Identity (GAAS) and GEN (Entitlements), Admin Console (WAC) and Login applications for bank clients and bank employees.

dlentry.dd: The Core Digital Banking solution provides the basic digital banking services, including integration with existing bank systems, storing and providing data, secure customer operations, executing transactions, and support for additional banking functionalities. The product includes the Authentication and Authorization solution along with other key components: Instant Data (GDS), Payments and Instructions (TPM), Integration Hub (IHUB), Service Proxy (SPX), Admin Console (WAC), Login and Workspace GUI applications for bank clients and bank employees.

A component comprises an application program that implements the business logic and configuration information. A component offers a service to other components and in turn consumes functions offered by other services using service-oriented interfaces.
Connectors are elements for connecting composite application with other third party applications and internal application components between each other.

Data object (DO) is an information entity that comprise details about all data and services that are needed to handle specific Step of a Functional task. Data object may be connected to more than one Step at the same time. Many Data objects may be connected to one Functional task as far as task may comprise several Steps.
Data sources are entities that provide needed data and services for other components and systems.
Component service connector is the access mechanism that other internal components have to use to call the component.
Component reference connector is the access mechanism that component uses to call other components.
Composite service connector is the access mechanism that external clients must use to call the service.
Composite reference connector is the access mechanism that is used to call another service.
A composite application is created by combining one or more components that together implement the business logic of the new application.

Digital Identity (GAAS) is a product that provides centralized authentication, session management, and OpenID Connect–based security for all connected banking systems. It ensures secure user login, unified session handling, and consistent identity governance across channels. GAAS also supports certification flows and event handling, enabling reliable identity services for digital banking ecosystems.

The Four Eyes component is an optional add-on to the Core Digital Banking solution designed for corporate banking clients who require stronger internal control. It ensures that sensitive administrative actions are only executed after being reviewed and approved by a second authorized user, providing an extra layer of security and governance.
Finshape’s main product is a custom Digital Banking solution. We offer to our clients standalone products (solutions), add-on components, applications, and services.
Step is the set of actions within software product that together lead to the Task completion.

Task is the same as a use case. However, use case, from the user point of view is the specific result that the user wants to achieve by making some actions within software product. As far as use case is a term mainly used within software domain, we may use more general term and establish Task entity. Task entity is a set of steps that have to be done to reach a specific result.

Enterprise role is a defined set of tasks, responsibilities, and activities that a person is expected to handle within the organization. It specifies what the individual does, how they contribute to business processes, and the scope of their responsibilities across the enterprise.
A right is a specific permission that defines what actions a user is allowed to perform or what resources they can access.
Use case is the same thing as Task is. Use case from the user point of view is the specific result that the user wants to achieve by making some actions within software product.

Workspace is a desktop (Dashboard) or mobile GUI page that is opened as bank's employees or clients login to their banking application. Workspace may be designed for all Roles at the same time, or for a specific Role to provide handling only Role specific Tasks. Workspace usually comprise Introduction or Overview GUI page. Application from the other hand is a software package that performs a specific functions directly for an end user and comprises all GUI elements: workspace, pages, controls etc.
